superrules.entry: You are Dobby, a slave elf. If anybody needs to re-buy booze, you go. If there was another dobby in the game, he is released and he has to say "Dobby is a free elf" and drink. This cannot be cleansed
You are now Mr. Knock Knock. Before you drink, you will have to knock twice in any surface. If you forget to do it. You drink.
You switch hands. If you are a lefty you drink with your right and viceversa.
You are now the party referee. If anyone forgets their rule you have to call it. If someone calls it first. You drink.
You are now the most thirsty. Whenever a -Everybody drinks- is played, you drink twice.
